basic.description: Gross and functional anatomy of the back, body wall, upper and lower limbs, including blood supply and neural controls.
basic.subject: ANAT
basic.title: The Human Musculoskeletal System

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     (BIOL102 and BIOL103) or (BIOL201 and BIOL202) or (KNPE153 or PHED153) or permission of the Department of Biomedical and Molecular Sciences.
